snippet: Roger Federer beat David Ferrer to win his sixth title at the Western & Southern Open, while Serena Williams finally claimed a championship that had eluded her by defeating Ana Ivanovic.
abstract: Serena Williams defeats Ana Ivanovic to win women's title at Western & Southern Open tennis tournament for the first time; Roger Federer beats David Ferrer in the men's final; victory is Federer's 22nd Masters Series title of his career, and his 80th singles title over all.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer beat David Ferrer to win his sixth title at the Western & Southern Open, while Serena Williams finally claimed a championship that had eluded her by defeating Ana Ivanovic.

headline.main: It’s a New Crown for Williams, but It’s Old Hat to Federer in Ohio
headline.print_headline: It’s a New Crown for Williams, but It’s Old Hat to Federer in Ohio
